signature_action: aggressive stance pointing forward, arms crossed with mechanical arm prominent, holding ground defiantly, confrontational gestures
description: A gritty, battle-hardened spartan/warrior type with a cybernetic edge—stoic, intimidating, and confrontational, posed like a veteran fighter who’s survived heavy combat and augmentation.

features.distinguishing: Muscular bearded man with short dark hair and a constant scowl/furrowed brow; circular cybernetic monocle/eyepiece over the right eye with a glowing red lens; frequent heavy mechanical prosthetics (notably a bulky robotic arm, sometimes a mechanical leg/hand); often shown with cape/strap and minimal armor, sometimes holding a coin with a 'B' mark.
features.costume: Minimal spartan-inspired gear: shoulder/torso straps and light armor pieces, leather bracers, occasional scarf, and a dark cape/cloak; prosthetic arm integrated as part of the silhouette; typically bare-chested or lightly armored with utilitarian accessories.
features.style: Stylized 3D character render (semi-realistic, game-cinematic look) on a solid black studio background.

images.description: Close-up 3D portrait of a dark-haired, bearded man with a red-lensed cybernetic device over his right eye against a solid black background.
3D-rendered bust of a bearded man in a 3/4 view holding a coin with a 'B' symbol, with a mechanical device over one eye and wearing a cape and shoulder armor on a black background.
3D-rendered bearded male character in a close-up portrait with a cybernetic eyepiece over one eye, raising a hand in a middle-finger gesture against a solid black background.

Stylized 3D male character shown from chest up in a 3/4 right view with a raised arm behind his head, thick beard, furrowed brows, and a red-lensed cybernetic device over his right eye against a solid black background.

Stylized 3D male character with short dark hair and beard, a red cybernetic monocle over one eye, a cape and leather bracers/briefs, posing with hands on hips and one robotic arm against a solid black background.
3D-rendered male character seated with knees raised, wearing a scarf and armor pieces, with a mechanical eye device and one robotic hand against a solid black background.

3D-rendered muscular bearded male character seated and looking left, with a cybernetic device over one eye and a bulky mechanical right arm, wearing a dark cape/strap and minimal armor against a solid black background.
3D-rendered bust of a bearded man with short dark hair, one green eye visible and the other covered by a circular mechanical eyepiece with a red lens, against a solid black background.
A bearded male character with a cybernetic right eye and mechanical arm and leg is shown in a low kneeling/crouched pose against a solid black background.
A 3D-rendered bust of a bearded man with short dark hair, scowling, with a red-lensed monocle device over his right eye and a chest strap with a circular badge, on a solid black background.

A full-body 3D male character with a beard and a red cybernetic eye, wearing a cape, armored right forearm, bracers, belt with loincloth, and armored boots, standing against a solid black background with one hand held to his chest.
A full-body 3D-rendered bearded man with a red cybernetic right eye and a mechanical arm, seated slouched in a gray armchair against a solid black background.
A bearded male character with a cybernetic eye device sits reclined on a gray armchair against a solid black background, wearing minimal armor and tall boots.
Close-up 3D render of a muscular bearded man with short dark hair, a cybernetic monocle-like device over his right eye, a strap and shoulder armor, and a dark cloak on a black background.
3D-rendered muscular bearded male character seated on a chair, looking left, with a cybernetic eye piece and a bulky mechanical right arm/shoulder armor against a solid black background.
